nodes.text: Kamtis Bonai was a male Bothan pirate, who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

The pirate band Bonai was part of once worked for the Dark Jedi Thaum Rystra. However, Rystra captured Bonai and some of the other pirates and took them back to the Temple of Pain, a Sith Temple built inside an asteroid located in the Tascollan Nebula. Rystra practiced Sith alchemy on them all and Bonai looked no different than he had before, although he had a maniacal look in his eyes.
